overview: When the contributor noticed a Japanese-style incident in his dead grandmother's room and turned the camera, there was a strange change... " The doll's room." A daughter who dreams of a long-haired woman being beaten to death by a big black man, when her father snuggled up and recorded it in the video, the spirit ... " A nightmare girl." Young people who find an abandoned house with a cursed mirror and are attacked by a curse of spirits...
title: 流出封印動画3
